title: Himi 131
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Ko e Hau ‘a Sīsū
Pea ‘oku pule;
‘I he fu’u mālohi lahi,
‘Oku teunga’aki.
2.
’Oku hoko atu,
‘Ene pule lelei
Ki he me’a kotoa pē,
Pea ‘oku fekau.
3.
Ke fai fiefia,
‘E he ngaahi kakai,
Fiefia ‘i he ‘ofa,
Mālohi ‘a Sīsū.
4.
Hiki homou loto,
Hiki homou le’o,
Pea hiva ki he pule,
‘Oku ‘i ‘olunga.
5.
Fakaongolelei,
‘A e Hau mo’oni;
Pea ‘uma ki he ‘Alo,
Kuo hiki hake.
6.
He na’e pekia,
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio;
Pea ‘oku mo’ui ma’u
‘I he maama lelei.
7.
Pea ‘oku nofo,
‘I hono taloni;
Ko hotau fakalaloa,
Ki he’ene Tamai. *
